import React from 'react' import styles from './Product.module.css' import bag from './bag.png' import { useState } from 'react' const Product = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ button: 'ADD' }) function changeState(e) { e.preventDefault(); setState({ button: 'ADDED' }) } return (
{props.colors} COLORS
{props.title}
) } export default Product
